description: Vendetta was so tough and willing her first time, and now she is back with a vengeance. Rarely do you get a girl as remarkable as Vendetta. She likes to fight, she likes to struggle, and she likes to have orgasms brought out of her. She struggles to avoid orgasms, so when you make her come you have beaten her. She hates losing, but she looks so hot cumming when she is trying not to. It is very satisfying making a girl like this crumble into orgasms when all the while she's trying to fight them off--very satisfying.
title: Vendetta
